00120     protected function loadActors()
00121     {
00122         $arrActors = $this->getXmlSequence()->getActors();
00123         
00124         foreach( $this->objXml->actors->actor as $xmlActor )
00125         {
00126             $intId = (integer)$xmlActor['id'];
00127             $strType = (string)$xmlActor['type'];
00128             $strName = (string)$xmlActor;
00129 
00130             $objActor = new XmlSequenceActor();
00131             $objActor->setId( $intId );
00132             $objActor->setType( $strType );
00133             $objActor->setName( $strName );
00134 
00135             $arrActors[ $objActor->getId() ] = $objActor;
00136         }
00137         ksort( $arrActors );
00138         $this->getXmlSequence()->setActors( $arrActors );
00139     }
00140 
00145     protected function loadMessages()
00146     {
00147         $arrMessages = $this->getXmlSequence()->getMessages();
00148         $arrActors = $this->getXmlSequence()->getActors();
00149         
00150         foreach( $this->objXml->messages->message as $xmlMessage )
00151         {
00152             $intFrom    = (integer)$xmlMessage[ 'from' ];
00153             $intTo      = (integer)$xmlMessage[ 'to' ];
00154             $strType    = (string) $xmlMessage[ 'type' ];
00155             $strText = (string) $xmlMessage[ 'text' ];
00156 
00157             $objMessage = new XmlSequenceMessage();
00158             $objMessage->setType( $strType );
00159             $objMessage->setText( $strText );
00160 
00161            if( !array_key_exists( $intFrom , $arrActors ) )
00162             {
00163                 throw new Exception( ' Actor From ' . $intFrom . ' not Found ' );
00164             }
00165             $objMessage->setActorFrom( $arrActors[ $intFrom ] );
00166 
00167            if( !array_key_exists( $intTo , $arrActors ) )
00168             {
00169                 throw new Exception( ' Actor To ' . $intTo . ' not Found ' );
00170             }
00171             $objMessage->setActorTo( $arrActors[ $intTo ] );
00172 
00173             if( isset( $xmlMessage->values->value ) )
00174             foreach( $xmlMessage->values->value as $xmlValue )
00175             {
00176                 $strName = (string)$xmlValue['name'];
00177                 $strValue = (string)$xmlValue['value'];
00178                 $objValue = new XmlSequenceValue();
00179                 $objValue->setName( $strName );
00180                 $objValue->setValue( $strValue );
00181 
00182                 $objMessage->addValue( $objValue );
00183             }
00184 
00185             $arrMessages[] = $objMessage;
00186         }
00187         $this->getXmlSequence()->setMessages( $arrMessages );
00188     }
